p: The pomelo peel essential oil obtained through steam distillation was diluted with 1% ( v/ v) Tween 20 aqueous solution to 20% ( v/ v) essential oil. This mixture was homogenized using a high-speed emulsion homogenizer (Ultra-Turrax T-25; Janke & Kunkel, IKA-Labortechnik, GmbH Co., Staufen, Germany) at 0, 13,500, and 24,000 rpm, for 0.5 min, yielding a 20% ( v/ v) essential oil emulsion. A 0.2 Î¼m filter membrane was used for degerming (Gelman Sciences, Ann Arbor, MI, USA), and the essential oil emulsions were diluted with sterile 1% ( v/ v) Tween 20 solution to different concentrations to determine antibacterial activity.
